#include <bsp_videoDecoder.h>

Data Fields

UInt32 channelNum
 

Detailed Description

Arguments for IOCTL_BSP_VID_DEC_GET_VIDEO_STATUS.

Field Documentation

UInt32 Bsp_VidDecVideoStatusParams::channelNum

Channel number for which status is needed

Channel number will be 0 in most cases, unless the device is capable of multi-channel capture like in TVP5158 in which case channel number can be from 0 .. Device specific max channels-1
